original_text: If I tried to fight God, he is much stronger than I am. And if I ask for justice, who can bring God to court? If I tried to fight God,
korean_text: 힘으로 말하면 그가 강하시고 심판으로 말하면 누가 그를 소환하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If I tried to fight God
he is much stronger than I am
And if I ask for justice
who can bring God to court?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 하나님을 법정에 데려갈 수 있을까?

sentences.original_text: If I tried to fight God
